tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bank_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount FLOAT,
    account_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ReconciliationStatus (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    statement_id INT,
    transaction_id INT,
    reconciliation_date DATE,
    is_reconciled BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE bank_statements (
    statement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    statement_date DATE,
    account_number VARCHAR(10),
    statement_balance DECIMAL(12, 2),
    statement_start_date DATE,
    statement_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reconciled_transactions (
    reconciliation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT REFERENCES bank_transactions(transaction_id),
    statement_id INT REFERENCES bank_statements(statement_id),
    reconciliation_date DATE,
    matched_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
